divs: sighting detailsi had just gotten off the 210 eastboud freeway, on arroyo\windsor. i noticed a group of flying object, so i thought it was helicopters or airplanes. they caught my attention because they were lined up.however, there isn't an airport around here. there is a helicopter landing site, but i am at least 99% sure they were not helicopters. i noticed these objects flying in a line towards east pasadena. the lights were solid. i was amazed! i lost sight of it once i pulled into my garage. i went back outside but i couldn't see them anymore. i believe it being a ufo. if anyone else saw the same thing, and can tell me otherwise, let me know! i've seen ufo's before!
trends: There have been 26 other sightings in Pasadena
There were no other sightings in Pasadena on or around April 23rd 2007
